item.title: The Journey Begins
item.description: This is not my first blog. It is, however, the first time in a couple of years where I’ve been in a place where having a blog made sense. I let my art take over while my writing fell to the side, but plans are in the works to bring my art and writing together. The project I have in mind has gone by the title of Child of Paradox since the first ideas formed in High School, so many years ago.
